Articles.Content:
Nope.

The user below me likes KSP

Hell yeah!

The user below me lives in USA.

True

The user below me thinks the Dragon V2 reminds them of a Sci-fi movie

... True.

The user below me is aware of the Egg god.

EDIT: Ninja'd (it was targeted at the "the user below me likes KSP" post)

--- Post-ninja ---

True!

The user below me is aware of the Egg god.

Uhm... You broke the freaking matrix.... You didn't say what I "knew"

The user below me knows how to dock.

Of course! like this, right?

The user below me is a psycho killer.

False, I've never killed a psycho.

The user below me has shaved their head at least once.

and not even true,

The user below me should stop loss his hairs.

Did you use Google translate? Because no, I shouldn't stop losing my hair. It's healthy.

The user below me is part of a fandom.

That's a loose term. It depends on how intense the fandom-ing is by your definition. By my definition of fandom, I am not in one.

The user below me is in a fandom and can't even.

I freaking hate fandoms...

The user below me knows what a PewDiePie is.

Ehyup.

The user below me knows the viscosity value of liquid helium II.

lolwut?

The user below me has been nuked by Gandhi. (It's a Civilization thing)

Actually yes... in one Civ Rev match.

The user below me likes pokemon.

Ahaha, not at all.

<---

The user below me has gotten lost in a Cornwall Tesco supermarket before.

Umm... no? I never been in Cornwall..

The user below me visited Poland in his life.

No. I plan to though.

The user below me likes seafood.

Yes i do especially virtual pokemon fish.

The user below me like all kind of food but never though about even trying to taste them.

False. There's lots of food I DISLIKE which I never even tasted (Ketchup, mustard for instance)

The user below me has never time traveled (especially backwards).

False. I set my clock back every fall.

The user below me prefers Coke to Pepsi.

YES GOD YES.

The user below me is made of atoms.

False, I'm made of pure vacuum.

The user below me is secretly not human.

True. I'm living flesh over a mechanical endoskeleton, sent back from the future to....I've said too much.

The user below me has seen that movie.

Who hasn't?

The user below me is an alien

May be, from my native language understanding i m a link

The user below is held to the past.
